alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 3:44AM MDT until April 19 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Strong wind and rough waves will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
